_description: Admonitory lines on treason, dread and mede, in a Latin sermon — three couplets

HerefordO35.Transcription:
verson treson dred & mede resounfor man has trespasde
                    aȝayns his god vnkyndlychTreson for þe deuill is aboute to be
                    gylle vs wykydlyDred of payn þat is comyng& med of blys
                    þat is with oute endyng
